website_summaries.verdict: A premium beef protein powder that offers a terrific combination of quality and affordability.
pros: Powder is 350% more concentrated than steak and more concentrated than whey to help accelerate muscle growth
Less expensive than many comparable powders
cons: Does not mix well with water
Strong taste means the powder is not for everyone

customer_reviews.title: Tastes awesome...but you'll need a blender.
customer_reviews.text: What I like: Chocolate tastes awesome!! Beef protein has creatine built in. What I don't like: very hard to mix. Forget spoons, forget shake bottles. You need a blender. I use a hand held blender which works great. But clean up is a bit messy, again because it clumps to everything. Final thoughts. Tastes better than any other chocolate protein powder I've ever had. Yes...it's a pain to mix, but the taste is worth it. I'd like to say I gained 10lbs of pure muscle from my first canister...but....not really. Can't really tell any gain difference at all from whey protein.
customer_reviews.author: YouMaybeRightIMaybeCrzy

customer_reviews.title: No whey and no bs
customer_reviews.text: No sugar, no carbs, no whey, no bs. If you're lactose intolerant and can't consume whey, then this is a no brainer. I've tried soy and other plant based protein, but it doesn't compare to what this product offers. I'm into my 3rd jug and will continue to use it as long as the quality stays the same. Protip: Add a bit of cinnamon and coffee creamer into the chocolate shake. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: A.Wiggin

customer_reviews.title: I think this bulk is fake
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the same product for more than 2 years and always been the same sometimes the taste changes a little, sometimes more foam sometimes less foam. But this time this one is completely different in texture and after shaking no foam at all and it smells like cocoa powder and tastes like one. and after 10 mins of having it i get terrible pain in my stomach. never experienced this with this product before in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have had amazing results with the Mass gainer
customer_reviews.text: I'm gonna save everyone the time and money. This protein, and the Carnivor mass gainer are the only proteins I will ever use. I have had amazing results with the Mass gainer, putting on only muscle, no fat what so ever. This protein is PERFECT for cutting cycle, while still building up your muscle and shredding off fat and water weight. 2.5mg of Creatine per serving. I will never use any other protein again. If you want awesome, fast results, look no further than this product.
customer_reviews.author: Etelfer

customer_reviews.title: Hard on digestion.
customer_reviews.text: I did not care for this protein. The taste was fine, but it does not mix well in milk (2 scoops in 20oz of whole milk), but more importunately, it was caused very uncomfortable digestive issues. I used the protein approximately 6 times with the most recent shake causing the most problems. A fiber supplement taken in conjunction may help. I've ceased using the protein and sold the remainder to a friend that recommended it and doesn't have any issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Shake well and walk away
customer_reviews.text: The foam. Ermehgerd, the foam. Add 1 scoop to 8oz of water in a typical 20oz shaker cup and it'll be full of foam by the time you're done shaking it. The good is it's a solid product with decent protein to calorie ratio and the taste is real good for not being your everyday chocolate. It's more of a cocoa flavor, if that makes sense. Beware of the creatine content if you're trying to cut as it will make you retain water, it's roughly 1/2 of what you'd get from a typical creatine supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua R. Coffey

customer_reviews.title: Good taste, needs more water to mix
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this protein because he is so sensitive to dairy. He loves it. The chocolate is a better flavor than his optimum whey isolate from Costco. The one thing to note is that you need about double the water of regular protein per scoop.
customer_reviews.author: somalley21

customer_reviews.title: Great for (mostly) plant based diets
customer_reviews.text: We eat plant based, so vegan diet accept I cheat and put this in smoothies. (Best of both worlds.) Works great. Not as good stand alone but if you blend it with granola, blueberries, almond milk, and avocado...you get a really good healthy smoothie that gives ya what you need. I only put 3/4 scoop but it lasts a while that way. If you look at the ingredients this is a great way to ensure you get the benefits of meat without any of the drawbacks.
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: Finally found my perfect protein supplement
customer_reviews.text: The taste is not at all as bad as some people say, but taste is an individual thing. I like the taste. Its nice and light (we got the chocolate). Im lactose intolerant and FINALLY, found a protein product that doesnt kill my stomach. Ive gotten really good results too in just a month.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for non-dairy people.
customer_reviews.text: Its a good option for someone who cannot take dairy products. The taste is decent; not the best but I have had no issues drinking this for months. The mixability of this product is really an issue though; I have to shake very vigorously for this powder to mix without globules being present. It is doable though. Itll workout your biceps and forearms while you make the shake - so thats good.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Decent Taste Bad on Digestion
customer_reviews.text: Decent tasting but strange in texture. Very sticky and hard to mix due to the proteins nature vs the creamier powder from a whey source. It became like glue left in my shaker. This protein was tough on my digestive system and did not have a great experience in the bathroom. You would need a strong fiber product with this. I take daily probiotics and still had a tough time taking this consistently. I really wish this protein was more realistic to take but too many negatives.
customer_reviews.author: Jaw

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it! It is fake or adulterated.
customer_reviews.text: The original carnivor protein of musclemeds that you can buy in a store is a wonderful product. It is the first time I buy it online and it is completely different. I would say this is a fake version of the original product, adulterated or mixed with something else. I have bought the carnivor protein in vitamin world for more than 2 years and it is always delicious, creamy, mixes perfectly in my cup, and I had never had digestive problems. This one I bought online is impossible to digest, produces horrible stomach aches. I will never buy it again online and will continue buying it in the store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GOOD STUFF!
customer_reviews.text: I usually get the whey protein isolate but thought I would try something different. I was a little scared of how it would taste after reading some reviews but I found the chocolate tastes better than the whey protein isolate I usually get. It reminds me of a Starbucks frappacino mocha flavor. Only downside is it's a lot thicker if you like to add a double scoop you're going to have to almost double the water. My usual whey protein I can double up with the same amount of water and barely tell any difference.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan T.

customer_reviews.title: Best protein I’ve had
customer_reviews.text: Hands down my favorite protein powder. In a plain shaker it does clump up a bit, I use an electric blender cup or actual blender and it comes out great. Flavor is one of the best chocolate proteins on the market. I’m not a big fan of the other flavors. And this is way easier on the stomach than whey. I stopped using whey proteins l because I always felt bloated or it would just cause digestive issues depending on the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Arod84

customer_reviews.title: Happy husband, happy life?
customer_reviews.text: I got about 1,000,000 brownie points with my husband by surprising him with this. He’s manly and he likes man things and he likes meats and he likes to work out. Meat protein powder just made sense. He loves the flavor and has used it in a protein shake every day since it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Flaga

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the value, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: Okay for the money I guess, but it taste awful imo. It reminds me of old coffee that's been sitting too long in the coffee maker. Cold and bitter. The protein content is great, but this obviously isn't a mass gainer. If that's what you're looking for, you won't be gaining with this. It has quite a few servings so it will last a while. Good value, but not anything incredible. I moved to something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line protein at a decent price.
customer_reviews.text: I buy protein based on purity and quality. This is highly pure hydrolyzed protein that seems to dissolve and assimilate well. I do not buy protein based on flavor, I want protein - Not a milkshake. That being said, This protein tastes decent. I'm a bodybuilder and drink 6+ scoops a day. It works for me, The high creatine dosage is highly synergistic and really helps me recover.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Pros outweigh the Cons
customer_reviews.text: Great value when it comes to beef protein powder. You get 2.5g of Creatine per serving too! For me I stopped buying my creatine monohydrate supp because it was redundant for my uses. The flavor took some getting used to. Sure it is chocolate, but there is a beef after taste that takes an adjustment period. Ive been using this for about two weeks and have noticed a serious decline in bloating and protein sources flatulence 😅. I will continue to buy and use until they come out with a better flavor of beef protein! Beef protein is worth it 100%!!!
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: BEST ON MARKET
customer_reviews.text: BEST ON MARKET - Was concerned with mixability from reading other reviews but found no justification for those claims. Product mixes and dissolves quickly. I use a blender bottle with wire ball. Let it sit for a few minutes for foam to shrink. RESULTS: use after every weight lifting session and when you eat a meal with low protein. Use as a meal replacement by mixing in some peanut butter. Get after it and after a couple short weeks you will notice an increased drive to train and lift hard. You will get swole.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Test both for yourself it seems that proteins react differently to each individual
customer_reviews.text: Several things you have to know, I used whey protein for several months, and this product for several months. The whey protein seems to get better results where as the beef protein is very slow at showing results. I believe that the whey protein absorbs better and is best used by your muscles. The beef protein costs 12.00 more than the whey to boot.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Raiche

customer_reviews.title: Great protein for heavy lifters
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite proteins. Tastes pretty good, tends to foam up a little, but oh well. I've gotten good results from several purchases. I'll stick with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Tastes okay alone, but better with added ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when I found that I have a sensitivity to dairy proteins. At first I was just taking it in water, which was tolerable. I soon started mixing 1 1/2 cups of almond milk to 1 scoop powder. That was much better. I have recently found that 1 teaspoon of instant coffee and cocoa powder each made it wonderful! Being a hard gainer, I have been following the Lyon Protocol, and with this powder included in my meal plan, I have finally began making measurable gains. You will need a mixer though. I just use Mason jars and my oster classic mixer base as a cheapie magic bullet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: By FAR the best protein supplement out of the dozens I’ve used
customer_reviews.text: By FAR the best protein supplement out of the dozens I’ve used. Great so far for both cutting fat and gaining muscle. Adding a healthy balanced diet, vigorous exercise, and 5-6 servings a day of carnivore has made a tremendous difference compared to other proteins. I’ve never seen results I’ve been looking for happening so quick. The only downfall is that although it’s not horrible to drink the shakes, it’s absolutely horrendous and painful sometimes comming “out”. If you can push through the first week or two, this aspect usually gets better. I’ve been using this product for 2years and wouldn’t choose any other protein as a dietary supplement.
customer_reviews.author: gaetano urbanio

customer_reviews.title: i get super bloated and tight stomached after using whey based proteins
customer_reviews.text: i get super bloated and tight stomached after using whey based proteins, on top of that my throat gets itchy with traditional protiens. this solved all of those issues. go with chocolate, it taste like someone made hot chocolate and then let it get cold. Strange, but very tolerable. just slam it down and get what its good for. I should add that since i started using this, i do feel a little leaner as apposed to the whey stuff i took before that was packed with maltodextrin.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Varden

customer_reviews.title: Solid based Protein
customer_reviews.text: Been using MuscleMeds Carnivor Beef Protein Isolate Powder for quite a while now and have had great results. I'm not a young guy (70) so protein intake is very important for me at this age. 1 gram of protein per Kilo of body weight for older men to prevent sarcopenia. I also mix in other Nootropics Supplements and two raw eggs to make this a killer drink twice a day. Only problem is this product has no FAT in it. And you need Saturated Fat to synthesize and Assimilate Protein properly. So you might to find a good quality source of fat to help with that.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great protein - chocolate flavor
customer_reviews.text: Great taste, I just put a scoop in my blender bottle and I like it ice cold, so I mix with with some ice cubes, and I add basically double the water they say to (probably a scoop of protein and 12-16 oz water), it tastes just like chocolate milk. YUM! And way less bloating than with whey or casein supplements! Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Tillinghast

customer_reviews.title: Not good at all, old batch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I've tried it before and it was quite good, this time on the other hand is terrible. Usually when protein gets old it starts to become quite difficult to dissolve, leaving lumps in your drink. This is the case with the product I got, only x1000 times worse. This is supposed to be new protein but instead its probably a super old batch because its literally impossible to dissolve. I'm using normal shakers and I'm left with huge lumps that make it undrinkable, so I tried with a small blender and even then there were still lot of lumps (although smaller ones than with the shaker) that couldnt be dissolved. Really terrible and unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Orozco

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it’s the creatine, not the protein
customer_reviews.text: Their formula always changes. To me is nasty, and it upsets my stomach. But i do bulk up. However, I think it is due to the fact that it has a lot of creatine.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: GREAT and you need a BLENDER toix well
customer_reviews.text: Muscle gain for sure , easy digest , chocolate taste. You need blender though. You need a blender in your house anyways. Won't mix without a blender. BLENDER I have bought about 12 times; 5lb I can't have dairy ( break out on neck and face ) and plant protein is terrible! If you have same issues , this is safe.
customer_reviews.author: shahin saboonpaz

customer_reviews.title: NO stomach issues with this
customer_reviews.text: I'm Lactose intolerant and have no stomach/digestive issues with Carnivore whatsoever. Why eat/drink dairy that's made for baby cows?? Wish it had Stevia extract instead of Sucralose for sweetener though...
customer_reviews.author: tmcc

customer_reviews.title: Results are good
customer_reviews.text: My partner is a naturally lean Italian man. He's easily put on 10 pounds of muscle in his chest and legs in the last 3 months with this and a creatine supplement.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Bad taste
customer_reviews.text: Awful taste. Tried to mix it with other things, but the overpowering nasty taste always came through. Went straight in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Heriberto C Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have issues with whey....
customer_reviews.text: Acquired taste but I like it with almond milk. I can feel the mega dose of creatine in a week. Doesn’t mix well with a spoon, but zero stomach upset like I get with any whey. A great alternative if you have this issue digesting large amounts of whey.
customer_reviews.author: joe bates

customer_reviews.title: I really like this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stuff! Perfect alternative to a dairy based post workout. The taste is nothing to write home about, but is not any worse than some other brands I have tried. I will say it does not mix as easily as some others, so use a bit extra liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Taste isnt' dairy, but its great for what it is.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, for us 'paleo' ish people who don't use dairy and think pea protein is just silly, this was a refreshing find. It's not going to taste like the dairy products, but seriously, it's pretty good for what it is. Just don't get the "shred" version. For some reason, that one has a terrible aftertaste.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jared

customer_reviews.title: This ish right here.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff right here, let me tell ya. This stuff right here is probably the best protein that I have ever had. It doesn't upset my stomach like whey or casein and it tastes like chocolate. It's hard to find a non whey protein that tastes like chocolate milk. If you're like me, and have a rough time with whey, soy, pea, or casein this is the stuff for you.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I've drank protein shakes for years, decades even and this is by far the best that I've had. Tastes like drinking a chocolate shake. I must admit I add about a cup of heavy cream and mix with ice cold water (I'm on a dirty-ish keto diet)
customer_reviews.author: West west

customer_reviews.title: Not the best tasting protein
customer_reviews.text: My husband says when he drinks this he has a gross taste in his mouth all day and can't get rid of it. He is committed to finishing it though.
customer_reviews.author: Morg

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Been using this protein for years now and I love it. I mix one scoop with one cup ice cream and one cup milk and it's delicious. If you use a shaker it will foam up but eventually settle. Chocolate is the best flavor! Oh and there's no beef taste if you were wondering.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Kussro

customer_reviews.title: Foul Taste
customer_reviews.text: I'm just basing my review off the taste. I've tried many different proteins over the years and this one ranks number one on my list of worst tasting. I'm not sure if I recieved a bad batch. It smells really good but when mixed, tastes like chocolate vomit.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Zee

customer_reviews.title: Tastes awful
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually not very sensitive to bad tasting chocolate proteins, but this stuff is pretty bad, and it frequently made my stomach upset. It tastes slightly fermented.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Eppehimer

customer_reviews.title: Try something else
customer_reviews.text: Tastes bad and doesn't mix well. Other than that it's great lol! I had the chocolate and it mixes poorly at least for me with just water and the flavor isn't real good. The specs for protein and creatine are great but I'll look for something else for the above reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Chad B. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff - better than whey.
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. I used whey powders for years and suffered the associated gastrointestinal effects. Not so with this powder. Make sure to give it a few minutes to settle after mixing because it does foam a bit, but better there than in your gut like whey.
customer_reviews.author: Sam the Man

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like chemicals
customer_reviews.text: Tastes like pure chemicals. Very hard to stomach. Had a total of 3 servings, rest is in the trash. Pay a little more for Equip Grass Fed Beef Protein
customer_reviews.author: amazonian415

customer_reviews.title: Great taste. Broken paper cap
customer_reviews.text: Everything is amazing except of weird cut cap. Check the pic. I will update the rate if I get any explanation or excuse.
customer_reviews.author: Bagitto

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: First protein supplement I’ve used that did not give me any gastrointestinal distress
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate is good. Just mix it about an hour before you ...
customer_reviews.text: Chocolate is good. Just mix it about an hour before you plan to drink it to let the foam settle. I accentually bought the fruit punch flavor and found it even better, actually a LOT better tasting than the chocolate. This is the best protein power drink mix I've ever found. How does it actually work? How do any of them work? Who knows. It's extra protein, pure and simple.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Best protein by contents, just look at the label. That being said, you can really feel the pureness when you let one rip (you will rip a lot) of the potency of the smell. I suggest opening all the windows. Also not to let it out in the car, almost suffocated.
customer_reviews.author: Ilya

customer_reviews.title: no thanks
customer_reviews.text: terrible taste could only drink 2 shakes then threw it away. thick and chalky and it foams in a shaker bottle
customer_reviews.author: Jwsocal

customer_reviews.title: I do recommend getting thw chocolate though
customer_reviews.text: I have tried every protein known to man (I'm exaggerating of course) and every one of those proteins have hurt my stomach one way or another. The carnivor on the other hand has no such side effect on my body. I do recommend getting thw chocolate though!! Every other flavor tastes like garbage! The chocolate tastes almost like a mocha, and when you mix in some peanut butter it tastes even better
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Used this for a while and it works good and you have to appreciate the value per pound for quality protein
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a while and it works good and you have to appreciate the value per pound for quality protein. Only draw back is the lack of mixing well, it tends to clump quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: the one called TJ

customer_reviews.title: Great protein.
customer_reviews.text: I have been a fan of MuscleMeds Beef Protein for a year now. This is my first time to try their Protein Isolate. This doesn't mix well with water but still tastes great.
customer_reviews.author: Traveller

customer_reviews.title: Great taste. Non dairy
customer_reviews.text: Great product for those looking for an above average, dairy free, slow absorption protein powder.
customer_reviews.author: shane hall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Some of the best quality one can get. Especially effective for those with allergies
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Taste amazing and good alternative for those who are lactose.
customer_reviews.text: I'm lactose so I decided to make the switch. I love this protein power and it taste really good regardless of what others may have said on their reviews. No after taste at all. I bought the Chocolate flavor and mix it with water.
customer_reviews.author: Edgardo Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Beware... Mostly Collagen
customer_reviews.text: Beware!!! This protein is primarily just collagen. If you want beef just eat a steak! PERIOD! Waste of money. It also cause the worse imaginable gas you’ll ever experience. Your house will smell as if you are hoarding dead bodies! Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.author: Cj Thomas

customer_reviews.title: It looks legit
customer_reviews.text: Received today, will post 60 feedback results from this product. Before and after pics
customer_reviews.author: christopher vera

customer_reviews.title: Used to be decent/tolerable.
customer_reviews.text: It has always been mediocre, but the only alternative to whey, so I lived with it. This last batch I had, however, was the most disgusting putrid rotten garbage I ever tasted. Taste always varies, but now it is downright poisonous. Fix your quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for shakers
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for shakers, blended smoothies baked chocolate goods. Mixes well, tastes great but it does have a different smell than most protein powders but that's typical of beef protein. Best for those who are GF, Soy Free and Dairy Free!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Good taste. Mix with water in shaker bottle then ...
customer_reviews.text: Good taste. Mix with water in shaker bottle then rest it for couple minutes for foam to dissipate. Good results. Gained strength and midline shrunk.
customer_reviews.author: Lilonemeg

customer_reviews.title: What's good and what's not
customer_reviews.text: Chocolate tastes decent but even better if you add banana and peanut butter. Foam can be annoying but it's the nature of beef protein powders. Tried other beef protein powders and pea protein powders and they sucked. Great for dairy intolerant individuals. No bloating!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: ... stars because the taste is awful and it foams like crazy, which takes 10-15 mins to go down ...
customer_reviews.text: -2 stars because the taste is awful and it foams like crazy, which takes 10-15 mins to go down - a real hassle when you’re trying to get up and to the gym quickly in the morning. The artificial sweetener leaves an aftertaste for hours. Otherwise it works as advertised, I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells like dog s***, tastes good.
customer_reviews.text: I can't drink stuff derived from dairy. Pea/rice protein is expensive and not complete. This stuff smells awful, but it mixes well and goes down easy. Has 2.5 grams of creatine. So if you are drinking 2 a day you are getting your maintenance levels without need for further supplementation
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great.
customer_reviews.text: I add one scoop to my morning smoothie. It dissolves quickly, no grainy texture or after taste.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Positives and Negatives
customer_reviews.text: I like the effect this product has. I take 2-3 scoops and start drinking it mid workout. I really feel it has helped me in the gym move more weight and pack on some muscle. The taste takes some getting used to and the powder is sometimes difficult to mix. Also, I would warn you to be near a bathroom 30 minutes after drinking it. All in all, I would use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Webb

customer_reviews.title: It is okay
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt mix too good but the taste is mature and amazing. It doesnt taste overly sweet like other products but there is that natural bitter taste of cacao which is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: 2pro

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product... only drawback is alot of creatine... you can only take 2 scoops of this a day because of the high concentration of creatine.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Arrived when they said it would
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and same great quality I have come to expect
customer_reviews.author: John Zulick

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product, couldn't get refund
customer_reviews.text: Bad product..tastes horrible, gave heartburn and they didn't accept returns for any reason...
customer_reviews.author: Lorena saldivar

customer_reviews.title: Great for muscle mass
customer_reviews.text: My favorite go to protein powder saw great results and recommended it to peers
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Horrible taste
customer_reviews.text: Tastes horrible. Only 12 ounce serving and it takes everything to finish it.
customer_reviews.author: dentmp01

customer_reviews.title: Easy mix and great taste
customer_reviews.text: I really like this protein. It mixes really well with water or milk. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: This thing is strong!
customer_reviews.text: I am by no means an expert in protein powders, but man this thing is strong. The flavor is definitely something to get around for me, but after all that, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Marc-Anthony Chérubin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Heard some good things about this product from some serious amature body builders so I thought I would give it a try. Put on 5lbs in a week. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Carl Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great mixed with 1/3 water and 2/3 nonfat milk. To me it tastes just like chocolate flavored malt o meal or kind of like the chocolate Twizzlers licorice. Should the results be there after I finish this tub, i'll buy more for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Real Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best taste
customer_reviews.text: Good nutrients and quality but it tastes too salty. I particularly had a hard time drinking it unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: John Goulart

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable strength gains and definitely better on my body than whey
customer_reviews.text: Noticeable strength gains and definitely better on my body than whey. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Super Rich Chocolate Taste
customer_reviews.text: It has a very rich chocolate flavor, but after awhile is too sweet. Despite most people’s fear, there is absolutely no beef taste. I’d recommend is you have any negative reactions to dairy products.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W.

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and my recovery time is shorter
customer_reviews.text: I drink this with water you only really need about 5oz of water for one scoop so its easier to drink in one go, it tastes great too.
customer_reviews.author: Agustin R.

customer_reviews.title: Pack on the beef like the strongmen of old
customer_reviews.text: This stuff rocks. I feel stronger just looking at the picture of the container as I type this review. I mix it with milk, not water as the instructions suggest. I find that with water it tastes a bit gross.
customer_reviews.author: patrick

customer_reviews.title: it came defective
customer_reviews.text: my jar of protein came without the seal, and it looks like it's been ripped, i think it shouldn't be like that, hoping to get a response from you guys!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Torres

customer_reviews.title: Blend It!
customer_reviews.text: Once I started blending it with a blender I liked it much better! I can now throw in spinach and coconut oil, whip it up and have a quick meal. I also mix with frozen blueberries!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne A Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great in smoothies
customer_reviews.text: Great in smoothies, a bit hard to mix on it's own. Flavor is great and it doesn't foam like whey protein does.
customer_reviews.author: Dan E.

customer_reviews.title: The taste is good not the best tasting protien but far from the ...
customer_reviews.text: The taste is good not the best tasting protien but far from the worst. It is a good alternative to whey.
customer_reviews.author: averagedude

customer_reviews.title: but after that it taste good.
customer_reviews.text: Taste a little weird for the first sip, but after that it taste good.
customer_reviews.author: Steven N

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I have a glass for lunch. Fills me up and keeps me going.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Laughman

customer_reviews.title: Good value and product
customer_reviews.text: Since most proteins are whey base they can leave you gassy, but this will not. It also mixes really well with water
customer_reviews.author: Deaf nasty

customer_reviews.title: I love chocolate cow.
customer_reviews.text: I've read mixed reviews on the taste, but I absolutely love chocolate. Has more of a cocoa taste to it. As far as effect.. I definintly recover faster than with whey. Not to mention the better digestion. For sure buying again when I run out of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Aking

customer_reviews.title: Tastes awful and sickeningly sweet.
customer_reviews.text: The taste is just awful. Worst beef protein powder I've ever tried. I'm going back to my previous brand which was more expensive but tasted SO much better than this. This is overwhelmingly sweet. I thought they couldn't go wrong with chocolate, but they did. No need to add so much sweetener! I'm not even halfway through the container and I will likely be throwing the rest of it away, I'm starting to get a gag reflex from it!
customer_reviews.author: Scooper

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty good but very rich
customer_reviews.text: I got the chocolate flavor.. It's pretty good but very rich.. This protein does not mix well at all.. U need a blender.. Or u can mix with a spoon and eat the sludge off the top, which isn't that bad.. The stats r great
customer_reviews.author: D. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great taste and texture, no after taste and great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Poodle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great whey alternative. I'm lactose intolerant and this didn't give me gas or make me bloated.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Bonus

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Carnivor Mass chocolate is great. Great taste and it doesn't make my stomach bloated. I would recommend this to anyone who want to add some weight with out the bloat.
customer_reviews.author: D Brown

customer_reviews.title: My son is sensitive to anything with whey protein and ...
customer_reviews.text: My son is sensitive to anything with whey protein and this is the only powder he can use. it definitely is easier on the stomach for me too, vice whey products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Mixes well with a hand mixer. Easy to digest. No sugar. Lean muscle gains.
customer_reviews.author: Adam A. Acito

customer_reviews.title: good to go
customer_reviews.text: found this overseas and love it I'm on my third tub really good stuff, chocolate is the best . the strawberry is good but flavor needs work. I was floored it was from my home state .
customer_reviews.author: William R Lasky Jr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and is Exactly what my son wanted! Excellent quality. Definitely recommend/ Definitely will reorder
customer_reviews.author: iloveshopping

customer_reviews.title: Could have better taste/texture, but mixes fairly well and works great.
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, it doesn't taste that great, but it's easier to digest than whey and has good beef creatine. My go to protein supp for years now.
customer_reviews.author: A. McGee

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great, I just use water to mix and it’s delicious
customer_reviews.text: The price is quite a bit hire than what I was paying but the product is great
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: perfect way to get your protein without all the carbs
customer_reviews.text: Delicious taste, perfect way to get your protein without all the carbs.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Ackerman

product_meta.title: MuscleMeds Carnivor Beef Protein Isolate Powder, Chocolate, 56 Servings, 4.5 Pound
product_meta.description:
Flavor:Chocolate| Size:4.5 Pound (Pack of 1)CARNIVOR Is The World's Best Selling Pure Beef Protein!
CARNIVOR Beef Protein Isolate delivers all the muscle building power of beef with greater amino acid levels than other protein sources used in supplements, including whey, soy, milk and egg. CARNIVOR Beef Protein Isolate (BPI) is even 350% more concentrated in anabolic muscle building aminos than a prime sirloin steak! And it contains no fat or cholesterol! Plus CARNIVOR is one of the most delicious protein shakes you’ll ever try!
The Muscle Building Power of CARNIVOR - Backed by Research*
New research substantiates what you knew all along… Beef builds muscle and strength! A groundbreaking clinical study presented at the 2015 International Society of Sport Nutrition (ISSN) conference in Austin, Texas showed that hard training athletes supplementing with CARNIVOR Beef Protein Isolate (BPI) gained an average of 7.7 pounds of muscle mass, while also increasing strength. Researchers gave test subjects CARNIVOR Beef Protein Isolate daily for 8 weeks while exercising 5 days weekly. Athletes taking CARNIVOR BPI experienced an impressive 6.4% average increase in lean body mass. In contrast, the placebo group did not significantly improve their body mass from baseline.

* Sharp,et al., 2015 ISSN International Conference [Poster]. Muscle mass data based on male subjects. Lean body mass gains compared to baseline. Based on 2 scoops (46 grams protein) daily. Female subjects also experienced an increase in lean body mass. CARNIVOR is Informed-Choice Certified, tested for over 200 banned substances on the WADA list, and produced in a GMP Compliant Facility. You can be confident you are getting the highest quality product available
feature_bullets: World's first and #1 selling beef protein
23g of muscle building USDA approved beef protein, without the unwanted fat or cholesterol
Easier on the stomach – lactose, sugar, dairy and gluten free
Features a clinically tested muscle building beef protein that is time tested with millions of bottles sold
350% More Concentrated Than Steak & More Concentrated Than Whey^The World's First Beef Protein Isolate^20 Times the Creatine Content of Steak!

specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
